prompt: Search prior home service inbound calls for the one where the customer reported fogging between the panes of a window and asked about replacement options.
Locate the inbound call where the caller requested an estimate to repair roof shingles damaged in a recent storm.
Find the earlier home service conversation where the client asked about fixing a sticking front door that no longer closes properly.
Retrieve the transcript of the inbound call where the customer wanted to schedule a technician to look at a leaking dishwasher.
Search past home service inbound calls for the one where the client asked about replacing a broken garage door spring.
Locate the earlier call where the caller asked whether you repair wooden window frames with rot along the sill.
Find the home service inbound call where the customer scheduled an appointment to have a ceiling stain from a possible leak inspected.
Retrieve the transcript where the caller asked about installing new energy-efficient windows in their living room.
Search previous home service inbound calls for the one where the client requested a quote to re-hang an interior door that had fallen out of alignment.
Locate the prior inbound call where the customer called back to confirm the arrival window for their technician visit.
Find the earlier conversation where the homeowner complained about cloudy glass in an upstairs opening and asked whether the insert could be salvaged.
Search past calls for the transcript where someone wanted a specialist to look at water spots spreading across the ceiling near the entryway.
Locate the call where the client asked about fixing the big panel that goes up and down over their parking bay after the cable snapped.
Retrieve the previous conversation in which a caller asked whether your crew works on built-in kitchen machines that no longer drain.
Search prior transcripts for the one where the customer wanted to know if you could realign the main entry so it would stop scraping the floor.
Find the earlier call where a landlord asked for help dealing with drafty openings in a rental unit before winter.
Locate the transcript where the caller requested a visit to check whether a stain on the upstairs plaster was from a leak or condensation.
Retrieve the past call where someone asked if your company could swap out several old panes for newer, more efficient ones in the living area.
Search previous conversations for the one where the customer wanted a rough price range before booking a visit to fix an appliance under the counter.
Find the call where the client asked to change the scheduled visit time because the person who needed to be home during the work had a conflict.
